data.title: MIGP Alumni
data.text:
This page presents information about our alumni. Our program is distinguished by being the oldest continuous graduate program in medical illustration in the world. The first Master of Science in Medical Illustration (MSMI) degree was conferred in 1951. The program is further distinguished by the reputation for excellence and professionalism of the 390 students who have earned their degrees at Augusta University. We are pleased and privileged to list the persons below as our alumni.

Notes: The list is organized by the calendar year in which the master's degree was conferred. Between the years 1965 and 1974 both baccalaureate and master's degrees in medical illustration were offered. Those persons receiving one or both are so noted. Additional advanced degrees are shown chronologically with respect to the master's in medical illustration. Names are shown in alphabetical order by last name at the time of graduation. (D) indicates deceased.

As a courtesy, links to email and/or Websites are provided for our alumni. We are not responsible for the content or operation of these links.
